<wfs:GetFeature service="WFS" version="1.1.0" xmlns:wfs="http://www.opengis.net/wfs" xmlns:ogc="http://www.opengis.net/ogc" xmlns:gml="http://www.opengis.net/gml" xmlns:er="urn:cgi:xmlns:GGIC:EarthResource:1.1" xmlns:gsml="urn:cgi:xmlns:CGI:GeoSciML:2.0" maxFeatures="20"> <wfs:Query typeName="gsml:Borehole" srsName="EPSG:4326"> <ogc:Filter> <ogc:And> <ogc:BBOX> <ogc:PropertyName>gsml:collarLocation/gsml:BoreholeCollar/gsml:location</ogc:PropertyName> <gml:Envelope srsName="EPSG:4326"> <gml:lowerCorner>78.75 -57.84475099289099 </gml:lowerCorner> <gml:upperCorner>352.08984375 17.14079039331665 </gml:upperCorner> </gml:Envelope> </ogc:BBOX> <ogc:And> <ogc:PropertyIsLike escapeChar="!" wildCard="*" singleChar="#" > <ogc:PropertyName>gml:name</ogc:PropertyName> <ogc:Literal>*WTB5*</ogc:Literal> </ogc:PropertyIsLike> <ogc:PropertyIsEqualTo escapeChar="!" wildCard="*" singleChar="#" > <ogc:PropertyName>gsml:indexData/gsml:BoreholeDetails/gsml:dateOfDrilling</ogc:PropertyName> <ogc:Literal>2004-09-17</ogc:Literal> </ogc:PropertyIsEqualTo> <ogc:Or> <ogc:PropertyIsEqualTo> <ogc:PropertyName>gml:name[1]</ogc:PropertyName> <ogc:Literal>http://services-test.auscope.org/resource/uri-cgi/feature/csiro/borehole/WTB5</ogc:Literal> </ogc:PropertyIsEqualTo> </ogc:Or> </ogc:And> </ogc:And> </ogc:Filter> </wfs:Query> </wfs:GetFeature>
